## Panel description 
#### Dimensions (in pixels) : 64x64
#### Scan factor: 1/32
#### Chips on rear side:  TC7258, DP5125, HCT245

## Specifications

  - Library version: 1.01
  - Platform: STM32
  - MCU board: blackpil STM32F411
